CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Moreover , the polymer solar cell as fabricated from the blend of the copolymer and di-perylene bisimide ( di-PBI ) as a non-fullerene electron acceptor exhibits a promising power conversion efficiency of 4.23% with V OC = 0.77 V , J SC = 9.8 mA cm^-2 , and FF = 0.56.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. Copolymer
2. Di-perylene bisimide (di-PBI)

These are the names of the materials used in the polymer solar cell.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. Copolymer
2. Di-perylene bisimide (di-PBI)

These are the only entities in the paragraph that refer directly to "Material Name".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name", presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Copolymer |
| Di-perylene bisimide (di-PBI) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.
